alert.note: Alert for Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Medicine Lake, or 32 miles north of Mullen, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River and Highway 97 crossing Big Creek. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 89 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
